actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to remove the prohibition on the concurrent payment of compensation for disability on account of a civilian work injury and of retired pay for a different disability incurred in service with the U.S. Armed Forces.

summary.text: Permits an individual receiving civil service disability compensation to also receive retired pay from the armed forces for a disabling injury other than the one for which civil service compensation is being paid. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8116)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to remove the prohibition on the concurrent payment of compensation for disability on account of a civilian work injury and of retired pay for a different disability incurred in service with the U.S. Armed Forces.
